about.title: About ChadNova
about.subtitle: Leading Chad's digital transformation with innovative solutions
about.description: At ChadNova, we are passionate about leveraging technology to solve real-world problems in Chad. Our team combines local expertise with global best practices to deliver solutions that make a meaningful impact.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bridge the digital divide in Chad by providing accessible, innovative technology solutions that empower communities and drive sustainable development.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become Chad's leading technology partner, fostering digital literacy and economic growth through cutting-edge solutions.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Innovation, sustainability, community empowerment, and excellence in everything we do.
